titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Isabel May Parsons family portraits and obituaries V1988.025
titlestmt.author: John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:20:44 +0000.

did.unittitle: Isabel May Parsons family portraits and obituaries
did.abstract: The collection consists of thirteen portraits of the Parsons family (circa 1910-1930s), a PS 92 class portrait (1917), and obituaries for Mary M. Parsons (circa 1920s). Mary M. Parsons was active in many Brooklyn charitable organizations. She died in Plainfield, New Jersey, in the 1920s.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item level description and digital versions of some images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Obituaries have been photocopied for preservation purposes.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Isabel M. Parsons, circa 1988.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Isabel May Parsons family portraits and obituaries, V1988.025, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Obituaries are in the public domain. All photographs will enter the public domain by 2059.
